pages.text: $(thing)Baronyte Ore$() generates within Baron Stone. It can be smelted to produce Baronyte Ingots, which are used in various crafting and infusion recipes
pages.title: Baronyte Ore

pages.text: $(thing)Blazium Ore$() generates within Hellstone deep underground. It can be smelted to produce Blazium Ingots, which are used in various crafting and infusion recipes
pages.title: Blazium Ore

pages.text: $(thing)Varsium Ore$() generates within Baron Stone. It can be smelted to produce Varsium Ingots, which are used in various crafting and infusion recipes
pages.title: Varsium Ore
